name: PC Nut
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Christmas Cookie,Pattern Name: Candle
title: Fot those wondering why Yankee Candles seem weak these days, there is a reason...they sold out.
text: I was a long time Yankee Candle buyer since the early 2000s through 2017. I used to buy them in the mall and stock up when they had the buy one get one free deals. My first hint something was wrong was when I bought holiday themed ones during 2016. They just didn't have the same "throw" even though I was buying some of the same scents. I thought it a fluke until 2017 holiday season and I knew something was not right. I bought a couple more last holiday season 2019 and they still sucked. I had some unopened ones from 2013 or so and fired one up in another room for comparison. Sure enough, the 2013 jar lit up the room in scent as we all were used to whereas these newer ones were just dead. Bear in mind that was a six year old candle! So, I did some research. You are far from alone if you noticed there isn't the strong "throw" of scent the original Yankee Candles had. Here's what one member of a candle website review forum said what's going on in his/her March 2020 post:,"A friend of mine worked at Yankee candles production facility the last 5 years and tells me that a lot has changed. When he started there was hardly any mineral oil used, now its about 40% of each candle. He says its just filler, so they don’t have to use as much wax. They keep upping the % of mineral oil as its a cheap filler and lets them make more per candle. He also says they have changed to a much cheaper scent. They actually have to use more per candle as its so weak, but its way cheaper than the older scent. He says constant cost cutting measures like this are implemented all the time to up the profits per candle. It’s far from the old Yankee Candle.",^^And there you have it. The new management of Yankee Candle is chasing profits over quality. Like many others, I have found MUCH better value in generic grocery store candles. Such a shame, but that's the beauty of capitalism for you. Someone fails, another fills the void instead of a socialist government telling you that you only have one option that they decide for you.
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2020

name: Linda Dazey
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Balsam & Cedar,Pattern Name: Candle
title: Hazard to your lungs!
text: Wish they would use true essential oils instead of fragrant chemicals! Very toxic for your home and lungs! I bought this knowing how toxic it is, but this was a present and that's what they wanted! Never in my lungs!
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2013

name: Sue C.
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Balsam & Cedar,Pattern Name: Candle
title: Nowhere near as good as it used to be
text: I'm writing a review to confirm that this year's batch of balsam & cedar candles are duds.  I bought mine directly from Yankee Candle, not through Amazon, and mine is lacking the Christmas tree scent of previous years too, so it's not a matter of Amazon having a knock-off.  It seems to me that Yankee Candle has tried to save on production costs by cutting back on the amount of essential oil they're using.  So disappointing!  I'm so sick of companies that boost their profit by decreasing their product quality but keeping the price the same (or even higher).  Buyer beware.
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2020

name: Customer
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Sparkling Snow,Pattern Name: Candle
title: Amazing
text: This is hands-down the best Yankee candle and I own like 40. My review on the Yankee website what's that it smells kind of like giving your 3rd grade teacher a hug  during Christmas time LOL. I really wasn't a fan of the other Christmas scents like "all is bright" or holiday lights (good but not strong enough and kind of perfumy). but this is totally different, I wouldn't say it has a marshmallow scent but it is very soft cozy scent, combined with the most subtle pine on Earth I would not know it was pine unless I read the description, I think it has kind of like a milky vanillaish base. it's really hard to describe but it reminds me of my third grade teacher who was my favorite person on Earth. So comforting but not at all perfumey. Just straight comfort. Great for any day any time. I'll have to buy like 10 more during the sale. Please never discontinued.. has medium throw.
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2020

name: Kat
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Balsam & Cedar,Pattern Name: Candle
title: Do you want to turn your house black? Yankee candles will do it for you! Probably your lungs too!
text: Do you want your house black? Because this will turn your house black.,I noticed dirt all over a large jug of water in the kitchen. I rinsed it off and the next day there was black all over the water jug again. What the heck?,Later, I noticed the Yankee candle in the kitchen had gone out so I went to relight it. There was dark sooty crap all over the inside of the glass. Huh. That's strange. Then I noticed dark sooty crap all over my coffee mug. Then the cupboards. The counters. My shoes. WTF. Then I looked up. The ceiling and everything within a 10 foot radius has a black hue to it. Everyone in the house has also developed a cough. I'm pretty sure this is the culprit. Did something happen to Yankee Candle??? Were they bought out by a cheaper company?? Are they trying to maximize profits by using sub-par ingredients and filling our house with cancer causing chemicals?? I wouldn't be surprised to see a class-action lawsuit soon.,***EDIT*** Jeez. Don't try and clean it off!! I'll need to get those Mr clean wipes or something. We moved our coats off the wall and found the lovely soot surprise behind them (and on them). Also, YES, I TRIMMED THE WICK.,Also: Foxtrot Uniform Charlie Kilo Yankee Oscar Uniform, Yankee Candles!!!
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2017

name: Marnie
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Christmas Cookie,Pattern Name: Candle
title: Yankee Candle
text: Found out a few days before Christmas that this item was either lost or destroyed in shipment. Was very disappointed.
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2012

name: PinkSugar
info: Size: Large 2-Wick Tumbler,Style: Balsam & Cedar,Pattern Name: Candle
title: Hardly any scent
text: I purchased this candle and scent based on other reviewers who have reported a wonderful pine fragrance but I must have gotten a defective product because there is practically NO throw. I have to stand over the candle to get a whiff of any kind of fragrance. Initially when we lit this candle, we could smell it - it was probably the wax coating on the wick that gave off the fragrance but after that, no scent. I had it burning for a good two hours but still no scent. Yankee Candle brand is usually very good, but not this particular product.
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2020

name: Eusebius
info: Size: Large 2-Wick Tumbler,Style: Red Apple Wreath,Pattern Name: Candle
title: Good candle, but not my favorite scent
text: I like most all of the larger candles from Yankee Candle, but I don't really love this one. Even though the scent is somewhat reminiscent of apples and cinnamon, to me it smells a little too artificial. When I first lit it and later came back into the room I couldn't recognize the scent and couldn't connect it with the candle. Maybe it's the walnut and maple that throws it off, but either way, it's not my favorite. I like it, but not as much as the other Yankee Candle fragrances.,As I wrote in another review, we've tried different brands of fragrance candles and none of them even come close to the Yankee Candles. They are long lasting and fragrant - the scent is even and continuous right down to the bottom of the candle. Other cheaper brands don't last ¼ the time or have ¼ the scent and actually turn out to be more expensive than a Yankee Candle in the long run.
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2015

name: Moo
title: It feels kinda cheap
text: I feel like these candles used to be a lot more potent and last much longer 10 years ago. This is a fantastic scent, but the candle will only fill a small room with a hint of the essence. There are air pockets in the wax which make it glisten and look posh, but that removes what I'm guessing is 10%+ of the volume that could be taken up by solid product. I'm sure it has something to do with the way it's designed to melt and disperse the scent in the large jar, but that's a problem for Engineering. At this point, it's more of a status symbol of how homey your living room is than a functioning scented candle
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2019

name: 5(me)ly
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Christmas Cookie,Pattern Name: Candle
title: Where is the scent???? We don't smell anything
text: I don't understand almost a 5-star review of this candle.,The scent is barely here, not even filling a small bedroom.,I purchased for a son, who was excited that his room is going to smell like cookies.,We waited for hours for the room to be filled with a wonderful scent, but this never happened.,I would rate the scent strength 2 out of 5, that is - barely noticeably by anyone in our family.,And being a Yankee candle, which last forever, I feel like I will never ever get rid of this candle :),Will not purchase this candle again.,P.S: From all the Yankee candles we purchased, the strongest so far were Salted Caramel and Chocolate Layer Cake.

name: Eusebius
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Balsam & Cedar,Pattern Name: Candle
title: One of the best Yankee Candles!
text:
This is one of the best Yankee Candles!  We light these during the holidays and the piney fragrance is marvelous and really adds to the holiday atmosphere.  It doesn't have a penetrating under-scent like some others do - it's certainly not overpowering but is always there and pleasantly noticeable and really adds to the atmosphere.  Our other favorite scents from Yankee Candle are 
,
   and 
,
  .,As I wrote in another review, we've tried different brands of fragrance candles and none of them even come close to the Yankee Candles. They are long lasting and fragrant - the scent is even and continuous right down to the bottom of the candle. Other cheaper brands don't last ¼ the time or have ¼ the scent and actually turn out to be more expensive than a Yankee Candle because of this.
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2014

name: aman4allseasons
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Mistletoe,Pattern Name: Candle
title: Pine like scent
text: One of my favorite scents I like to use during the holidays; A nice pine like and berry scent with a good throw to it. A great candle if you like to use other than a straight pine or fir scent.,Suggestions,Issue: Jar candles that don't burn evenly.,Purchase (available online) waxed candle wicks with the base 6-8" in length and a 12" long drill bit around 11/64,Drill a hole offset of the main candle wick about 3/4-1" clear to the bottom of jar. Detach base of purchased 6" wick and insert into drilled hole and trim to same length as original wick; now you have a 2 wick candle which will burn more evenly.,Suggestion,When your jar candles wick has expired and there is that little bit of wax left. Place Jar on oven burner and melt wax over low-med heat. When melted remove old wick base with a fork and place,another wick as mentioned above but do not detach from base. place in melted wax and you have a makings of a new candle and just melt wax from other used candles and pour into jar candle with the new wick. after about 6 + used candles you will have a new candle. I keep my fall and pine- Christmas candles separate.
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2013

name: Marie Monahan
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Christmas Cookie,Pattern Name: Candle
title: I was so disappointed that only 1 of the 6 candles purchased had ...
text: I purchased 6 large candles at one of their Mall stores.  The candles were offered “buy one get one free” sale.  I was so disappointed that only 1 of the 6 candles purchased had any scent even though they were burning for hours.  The best scented candle was “Chocolate Cake”.  What has happened to Yankee Candle????  Maybe too many companies have purchased it in the past few years and are trying to rest on the laurels of the once top scented candle while cutting corners for profit making.  The same thing happened to Elizabeth Arden’s “Red Door” perfume once the Arden company was purchased and does anyone recall the lovely fragrance, “White Shoulders”?  The scent is not recognizable any longer.
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2018

name: BuffyBuff
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Home For The Holidays,Pattern Name: Candle
title: Baked goods & fireplace!
text: My 2nd favorite Holiday scent (1st being Christmas Wish) from Yankee Candle.  I have been buying this scent for years, typically it is my pre-Christmas (November-ish) scent as it not quite Christmas-y to me but definitely not your ordinary Autumn scent.  The first thing you smell is the cinnamon, it is very strong (which I like -- I feel spicy scents are excellent at removing odors from the air, sweet scents just hang around too much and get nauseating) but so nice.  Then you smell what is stated as balsam but to me it is a fireplace/burning wood fragrance.  It is one of the combination scents (which I love) of Yankee's that I really find comforting -- I like the scents that you can't really figure out what you are smelling but the effect is wonderful.  To me, this fragrance is all about Thanksgiving -- before I light up the Christmas Wish.
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2013

name: TVAddict
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Balsam & Cedar,Pattern Name: Candle
title: R.I.P. - off Yankee Candle
text: Buyer beware-if you are able to get a candle that actually emits a scent (has a "throw") while burning, then lucky you.  But the quality of YC has gone steadily downhill for the last few years so don't be surprised if its basically has no scent.  What made me "retire" from purchasing YC is that I received a number of candles on a large order that weren't even filled up to the top-they didn't even get filled to the top of the label!  That is VERY poor quality control and a major rip off considering the price.  There are now many copy cat candle manufacturers that have just as fragrant candles and are a lot more reasonably priced-and I'm more than willing to give them a try.
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2017

name: Jennifer Cox
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Mistletoe,Pattern Name: Candle
title: Maybe just a bum jar, but no scent
text: I was simply "pining" for real Christmas tree scent.  I bought this candle confident it would deliver, as most Yankee candles do, but this one was a dud.  It just doesn't put out any scent.  Today, I walked into my hair salon today and immediately smelled the most delicious Christmas tree fragrance.  I darted my head around looking for the cluprit, expecting to find a 13 foot fresh Frasier Fir near by when my eyes fell upon the source.  It was a Trapp White Fir candle.  The salon had stock there to sell and I snatched one up immediately.  Lit it when I got home, and as I sit here right now the heavenly scent is filling our home.  Never heard of Trapp candles until today.

Detach base of purchased 6" wick and insert into drilled hole and trim to same length as original wick; now you have a 2 wick candle which will burn more evenly.,Suggestion,When your jar candles wick has expired and there is that little bit of wax left. When melted remove old wick base with a fork and place,another wick as mentioned above but do not detach from base. place in melted wax and you have a makings of a new candle and just melt wax from other used candles and pour into jar candle with the new wick. after about 6 + used candles you will have a new candle. I keep my fall and pine- Christmas candles separate.

name: Zolton
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Mistletoe,Pattern Name: Candle
title: It's Hit or Mistletoe
text: I'm not a big Christmas guy. If I find myself sitting on the knee of some fat bearded guy at the mall, telling him what I wish for most and whether I've been a naughty boy, then I've got a whole world of problems I really don't want to think about.,Still, 'tis the season. So at my wife's insistence, I'm making an effort to find the "Christmas spirit" this year. Where by "find", of course I mean "buy".,Mistletoe is an old Christmas standby, and romantic to boot. But who wants some hacked-off bit of poisonous plant looming over their doorway? Better, I thought, to bring the tradition home in candle form. I'm not usually so keen on the aromas of things that end in 'toe', but I have to say, this candle smells really nice and piney fresh.,As mistletoe, it's another story. I tried angling for a smooch from my sweetie the other day, lifting the candle above our heads in the established mistletoe tradition. Sadly, the candle is rather heavy, and when I leaned in for a peck I accidentally dropped it on my own head. I thought I was getting a kiss, and instead I wound up on the floor bleeding from a head wound and trying to remember the name of the letter that comes after 'G'. And that doesn't spell "Christmas" in my book.,More like "junior prom", from what I can recall. At least that came with a boutonniere and a flask full of Boone's Farm. Now all I've got is memory loss and this smelly green candle.
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2011

name: ValJoy
title: According to Phil Lester
text: Smell like a burning lantern that's been covered in snow. Oo! That's mysterious! I'd expect to sniff that if I went into like the home of a psychic and she'd just released a snow beast into the house. It's good! It's a bit perfumy, it smells a bit flowery. I don't like ones that smell of flowers. Musky. It's like winter musk. Might burn that one soon. Get to the musky vibe. -Phil Lester (YouNow Nov 28, 2015 21:40)
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2015

name: Alexis Baxter
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Christmas Cookie,Pattern Name: Candle
title: Great Scent!
text: This scent has a great balance to it. It's not too strong yet you can definitely smell it. I love it's warm, vanilla sugary smell year round. If I'm in the mood to smell something vanilla I just pull out one of these candles. I've been purchasing them for many years and will continue to as long as the scent is offered. I'd definitely recommend this scent!

info: Size: Large 2-Wick Tumbler,Style: Bundle Up,Pattern Name: Candle

text: You can smell like children wearing coats... that's the scent you need in your life.... Oo! that's good! It smells like you've just fallen out of a tree and loads pine needle have fallen into your mouth. Yeah. I feel warm and cozy. Good one. I'd recommend that. It's nice. It's nice! -Phil Lester (YouNow Nov. 28, 2015 20:50)

name: Alice
info: Size: Medium Jar Candle,Style: All is Bright,Pattern Name: Candle
text: I bought the All is Bright Yankee Candle as a gift for my friend and her husband for Christmas as they'd been through a rough time. Sort of a symbolism gift that they made it through the other side and 'all is bright' again.,Yankee Candles are a bit on the pricier side, but the medium jar lasts a decent amount of time and the smell fills the room so I feel like it makes up for it.,One thing I would say is if you buy a medium/large jar, make sure you have the time to burn it for a decent period of time so the melted wax can even out. Otherwise the candle won't melt properly which can be a bit wasteful (if this happens when it's completely burnt out, I usually melt down the remaining wax myself and create another candle with other waxs).,I would recommend this candle for people who like refreshing, light scents.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 26, 2019

name: c_jamesn
info: Size: Medium Jar,Style: Christmas Eve Red,Pattern Name: Candle
text: Personally I've never tried this candle before I purchased it from Amazon directly so I thought for the price I would give it a go this Holiday season;  I started burning it two weeks ago and I have to say the smell is rather strong (not over powering but pleasantly strong). I would describe it myself as a "warm smell" which ideally is good to burn around December - early January.  I plan on buying one for next Christmas if this candle is finished by then.  I would recommend it !
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 25, 2016

name: The_Gunslinger
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Celebrate Christmas,Pattern Name: Candle
text: Read the reviews that this candle has an extremely strong scent. However the candle we received did not, in fact it barely gave off any scent at all.,Bought the same candle from the local town and the difference was instantly discernable.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 26, 2017

name: Viv H
info: Size: Large Jar Candle,Style: All is Bright,Pattern Name: Candle
text: Good candle,  good yankee quality as expected.  Single wick.,Fragrance travels well on this one.,Is quite a refreshing, enlivening scent.,A little bit too citrusy for me, but not unpleasant.,I find a bit intense , and half hour burn time is good in my medium size dining room.,Nothing particularly Christmassy about this one, I use mine any time of year, & is a particularly good one for after cooking food, to clear cooking aromas.,It's not ( in my opinion) especially sweet , it's refreshing mainly citrus, quite uplifting,  and quite a stimulating, awakening scent.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 2, 2020

name: Glenbuck
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Balsam & Cedar,Pattern Name: Candle
text: Ordered this candle before i went away on holiday for a week. Came back from holiday yesterday with the blues knowing i was back to work monday. Found my candle that had come while i was away and just lit it. Holiday blues now disappeared, i'm sitting here enjoying the beautiful christmas tree scent, its spread all over my large lounge and you can smell it in the hall. Its not overpowering but not one of those candles you have to stand over to smell. It arrived really quickly,and well wrapped. Thank you for getting rid of my holiday blues!
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 17, 2016

name: mollolino
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Celebrate Christmas,Pattern Name: Candle
text: Ich bin ein großer Fan der Yankee Candle Produkte und kann auch hier nichts anderes als 5 Sterne vergeben. Christmas Eve ist mein absoluter Lieblingsduft. Schon in der Vorweihnachtszeit macht er Lust auf Heilig Abend, denn er ist sehr festlich und weich. Die Brenndauer der Kerze entspricht sehr genau der vom Hersteller angegebenen. Sie rußt kaum und brennt schön gleichmäßig ab. Die Qualität ist wie eigentlich immer bei YC sehr gut. Insgesamt ein toller Weihnachtdsduft, den ich sicher nicht zum letzten Mal gekauft habe und der sich auch toll als Geschenk eignet.
date: Reviewed in Germany on July 25, 2018

name: m
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Christmas Cookie,Pattern Name: Candle
text: Yankee Candles provide good value in their mid market position, with attractive lidded jars and pleasant fragrances, although I would urge doing some in-store sniffing before purchase where possible to check the smell is to your taste.,For best burning experience, keep the wick trimmed to no more than 3mm and use a candle snuffer to extinguish as that helps prevent the wax going everywhere.,This is an attractively scented candle, perfect for dinner table, lounge, bedroom and as a secret Santa/stocking. The lid helps keep the dust off between burnings although this one smells so nice it is unlikely to get a chance to accumulate dust in this house.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 17, 2019

name: lynne robinson
info: Size: Large Jar Candle,Style: All is Bright,Pattern Name: Candle
text: Just come to wrap these candles as they were purchased as Xmas gifts , the right scent name ( the one I ordered ) is on the outer box , fortunately I decided to check inside to find they were all " clean cotton" fragrance, not " all is bright" . I don't have time to return and replace them now either ! Plus this is a scent I can buy cheaply in the supermarket.  I won't buy from here again ! Disappointed:(
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 16, 2020

name: Die U's
info: Size: Medium Jar Candle,Style: Christmas Magic,Pattern Name: Candle
text: Kam schnell, gut verpackt und heil an.,Yankee Candles, die sie kennen lieben sie, die sie nicht kennen, haben etwas versäumt.,Vorab: Der Preis ist gerechtfertigt.,Diesmal habe ich mich für Christmas Magic im mittleren Jar entschieden und nicht bereut. Der Duft ist angenehm und nicht aufdringlich, dennoch wahrnehmbar.,Kopfnote: Bergamotte, Eukalyptus, Mandarine.,Herznote: Kiefernnadeln, Tannenharz, Weihrauch.,Basisnote: Birke, Zedernholz.,Ein festlicher Duft für die Weihnachtszeit.,Nicht vergessen: Vor dem Anzünden immer den Docht kürzen und so lange brennen lassen bis die oberste Wachsschicht komplett geschmolzen ist. Dann hat man lange Freude damit, denn die Kerzen halten sehr lange.,Kaufempfehlung!

name: Die U's
info: Size: Large Jar Candle,Style: Festive Cocktail,Pattern Name: Candle
text: Tolle Kerze in gewohnter YC-Qualität. Mit der richtigen Pflege (Docht vor jedem Anzünden kürzen und so lange brennen lassen, bis oberster Rand flüssig ist) brennen diese Kerzen lange und gleichmäßig ab ohne zu rußen.,Dieser Duft war neu für mich und ich habe den Kauf nicht bereut. Für mich ein gelungener Duft, einer der besten Düfte die ich bis jetzt hatte - und ich habe schon so einige ausprobiert. Ich kann ihn schwer beschreiben, für mich riecht er blumig und leicht süß, ohne aufdringlich oder billig zu wirken. Ein wirklich festlicher Duft.,Wer Duftkerzen mag hat sein Geld in diese Kerze gut investiert. Jeden Cent wert!
date: Reviewed in Germany on February 15, 2017

text: Profumo molto buono, dolce ma non troppo, intenso e non fastidioso, da atmosfera calda, persistente. Unica nota negativa il cratere che si è formato nel centro, nonostante l'abbia fatta bruciare per ore ogni volta. Alla fine mi sono arresa, l' ho "livellata" manualmente togliendo la cera che non riusciva a sciogliersi. In questo modo però ho certamente diminuita di qualche ora la sua durata. Peccato! Consegna nei tempi stabiliti e dotata di imballo idoneo, robusto e arrivato intatto.

name: Yannick
info: Size: Large Jar Candle,Style: All is Bright,Pattern Name: Candle
text: Ich hatte mir unter dem Duft "All is Bright" eigentlich etwas anderes vorgestellt. Für mich roch die Kerze leider gar nicht nach der dunklen Jahreszeit oder Vorweihnachtszeit. Es hatte eher etwas von einer "normalen" Duftkerze oder Duftstäbchen die man fürs Gäste-WC beim Drogeriemarkt um die Ecke kauft. Also meiner Meinung nach kein Geruch der 25€ wert ist! Da ist zum Beispiel "Red Apple Wreath" oder "Snow in Love" deutlich stimmiger und hochwertiger von der Duftmischung.,Ich gebe trotzdem 4 von 5 Sternen, da ich ein großer Fan der Yankee Candles bin und es sehr, sehr hochwertige Duftkerzen sind!

name: Andrea
info: Size: Large Jar Candle,Style: All is Bright,Pattern Name: Candle
text: Fra le tante Yankee candle che ho regalato a mia moglie nel corso degli anni questa è la mia preferita. Il profumo che emana si sposa molto bene al periodo Natalizio ma in generale di festa. L'unico neo è il solito fatto che la candela tende a consumarsi nella parte centrale lasciando un solco che non è particolarmente bello da vedere. L'unico modo per risolvere è quello di mettere in parità manualmente la base della candela ma facendo in questo modo ovviamente andremo ad intaccare quella che è la durata del prodotto. In ogni caso sono piccolezze per un regalo unico che nel mio caso è sempre stato di gradimento verso la persona a cui l'ho donato e sicuramente contribuisce a rendere più accogliente l'ambiente in cui la si decide di accendere.
date: Reviewed in Italy on December 27, 2019

name: Daniel Elston
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Christmas Cookie,Pattern Name: Candle
text: Great candle!
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 15, 2015

name: Fran08
info: Size: Large Jar Candle,Style: Macaron Treats,Pattern Name: Candle
text: Zuerst habe ich die YC in dieser Duftrichtung (und überhaupt das erste Mal so eine teure Duftkerze) als Votivkerze getestet. Der Duft hat mich so umgehauen, dass ich kurze Zeit später, nach einigen Überlegungen (22€ für eine KERZE sind ja nun wirklich nicht wenig, absolutes Luxusgut) dann die große 623g Version mir zulegte. Sie brennt wunderbar ab, verteilt ein absolut fantastischen Duft im ganzen Raum und brennt vor allem sehr sehr lange! Habe sie nun seit ca. 2 Monaten und ca. 3x die Woche für einige Stunden (4+) brennen und ich bin nun etwa bei der Hälfte angelangt. Den Duft nach frisch gebackenen Macaron, wunderschön süßlich, fand ich so toll, dass ich diese Kerze auch schon verschenkt habe.
date: Reviewed in Germany on December 19, 2017

name: martina
info: Size: Large Jar Candle,Style: All is Bright,Pattern Name: Candle
text: Qualità impeccabile yankee. Arrivata imballata benissimo e al 100 per cento originale. Come profumazione è veramente una delle migliori che io abbia mai avuto. Perfetta come profumazione per chi ama le note agrumate ma anche con retrogusto di vaniglia. Non è affatto stucchevole ma molto frizzantina. L'immagine è molto carina perfetta per le feste e non solo. L'odore si sente molto bene se accesa per almeno un'ora ,profuma la stanza anche abbastanza grande. La consiglio. Yankee è sempre una garanzia. L'ho pagata 20 euro in sconto e ne vale veramente la pena.,Aggiornamento.,Dopo averla accesa molte molte ore ,ancora è a poco meno della metà.  È veramente uno dei profumi migliori che io abbia mai avuto. Ne ho altre tre ma questa è imbattibile. Delicata ma persistente al punto giusto ed emana odore quasi subito da appena si accende.
date: Reviewed in Italy on December 10, 2020

name: The Duke
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Balsam & Cedar,Pattern Name: Candle
text: I think this candle is  overpriced for what you receive. The traditional glass container is nice, but there is not a strong scent from this candle. I had it burning all day, and each time any guest arrived, they could not really smell the scent. I purchased this brand because I heard good things about them, but honestly I can find much nicer candles with plenty of the natural scent oils. I really hate leaving negative feedback but I wouldn't purchase this brand again.
date: Reviewed in Canada on December 29, 2020

name: Amazon Customer
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Christmas Cookie,Pattern Name: Candle
text: Let me start by saying that I have been a yankee candle lover for two decades and have bought more candles than I could ever count....theses DO NOT smell like yankee candles!!!!!,So angry to spend that kind of money on what should be a strong scented candle, only to get a candle with next to zero scent!,I just bought the Christmas Cookie from their store in the states and it smells exactly like it should.,Bottom line: dont waste your money here and by it from the store!
date: Reviewed in Canada on December 26, 2019

name: G.D.C.
info: Size: Large Jar,Style: Balsam & Cedar,Pattern Name: Candle
text: Tengo varias velas de esta marca, la compré pensando que olerla a bosque, pero que decepción! Ni encendida huele a nada! Y tiene un ligero aroma a EUCALIPTO y NO a Cedro. De cualquier manera ni siquiera se distingue.
date: Reviewed in Mexico on November 4, 2020
